content: --- title: River X Services description: Explore River X services for seamless data retrieval from source systems. Consult documentation, code snippets, and sample responses. Details on response fields available on River X Data Model page. Utilize integrated Swagger UI for service examination. published: true date: 2025-01-21T13:49:36.202Z tags: service, api, graphql editor: markdown dateCreated: 2022-11-02T14:42:39.535Z --- > River X services supports REST standarts as well as graphql capabilities. The GraphQL documentation can be accessed through the GraphQL UI Docs tab. #### GraphQL UI URLs ##### Crew Service ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/crew/graphql-ui/ ``` ##### Flight Service ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/flight/graphql-ui/ ``` ##### Ground Service ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/ground/graphql-ui/ ``` #### Swagger UI URLs ##### Crew Service ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/crew/swagger-ui/ ``` ##### Flight Service ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/flight/swagger-ui/ ``` ##### Ground Service ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/ground/swagger-ui/ ``` > ISO-8601 instant format is used for date and datetime fields. Ex: "2011-12-03T10:15:30Z". {.is-info} # Crew Services - Crew Info - Crew Roster - Crew Pairs/Trips - Crew Duty - Crew Activity - Crew Flight - Crew Ground Activity - Crew Flight Transports - Crew Ground Transports - Crew Layover - Crew Simulator Flight - Crew Roster Notices - Crew Notification Alerts - Crew Qualifications - Crew Documents - Crew Base - Crew Bid - Crew Employment - Crew Communication - Crew Statistics # Flight Services - Flight Leg - Flight Leg Times - Flight Crew - Flight Delay - Flight Crew Need Vector # Flight Plan Services - Flight Plan Info - Flight Plan Alternative Airport - Flight Plan Runway - Flight Plan Weight - Flight Plan Fuel - Flight Plan Trip Info # Passenger Services - Flight PAX Info - Flight PAX SSR - Flight PAX Transfer - Pax Info - Pax Summary - Pax Boarding Summar
